name: Pong Buster
description:
This is a small clone game of Pong. I wanted to make a game to develop my Unity2D skills and start a portfolio. There is no computer player, this is just a local multiplayer, sit on the same keyboard game. 

Background by omfgdude on OpenGameArt
https://opengameart.org/content/chill-lofi-inspired

Font - Kenny High Square

Thanks for playing
